content: turn work row 4 ws sl1wyif p to 1 st before gap p2tog 1 st from each side of the gap p1 turn work repeat row 3 & 4 until all heel sts have been worked ending with a ws row note on the last repeat you finish row 3 with ssk and you finish row 4 with p2tog 18 20 22 sts remaining gusset set up round pick up and knit 17 18 19 sts along the established pattern for the the side of the heel flap one st for every edge st instep m1 between the heel flap and the instep of the sock p1 k2 p2 to 3 sts left k2 p1 pm to mark beginning of instep knit 32 36 40 held sts in established pattern pm to mark end of instep established pattern for sole m1 between the instep and the heel flap pick up and k knit 17 18 19 sts along the side of the heel flap k9 10 11 pm to mark bor 86 94 102 sts 3 copyright tone cecilie nystrøm 2023 tcstrikk@hotmail com tonececilie on ravelry @tcknits on instagram gusset round 1 k to 3 sts before instep m k2tog k1 sm k32 36 40 in established pattern for instep sm k1 ssk k to end of round sm 2 sts decreased gusset round 2 knit in established pattern work gusset rnds 1 2 a total of 11 11 11 times 64 72 80 sts foot continue to knit gusset round 2 till work measures 4 5 5 5 cm before full length toe round 1 k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to end of round 4 sts decreased round 2 k repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 40 44 48 sts on your needles repeat round 1 until you have 20 20 24 sts on your needles arrange your sts so that the sole 10 10 12 sts are on one needle and the instep 10 10 12 sts are on another needle graft toe close with kitchener stitch knit another sock weave in all ends and wet block the sock to relax the stitches abbreviations pm place marker bor beginning of round repeat - repeat co cast on round s round s dpn s double pointed needles rs right side k knit sl slip one st k2tog knit 2 together sm slip marker m marker ssk slip slip knit m1 make one knit st st s stitch es p purl ws wrong side p2tog purl 2 sts together wyib with yarn in back wyif with yarn in front good luck with your knitting enjoy your warm feet in beautiful socks i love seeing what s on your needles be sure to tag @tcknits and use the hashtags #tcstrikk and #vanillasockmormorstyle when posting online 4 copyright tone cecilie nystrøm 2023 tcstrikk@hotmail com tonececilie on ravelry @tcknits on instagram
